subject: School Payment {{SCHOOL_NAME}}
description: Email templates when a school is sent to a customer
school_body:
Dear {{SCHOOL_NAME}},

Thank you for your purchase of {{NUMBER_OF_SUBSCRIPTION}} of paid annual classroom subscriptions of the 21st Century LMS.

The academic year classroom subscription of our 'Near Future Technologies + NEP Values education package for 21st Century school' gives you access to following:

- Near Future Tech modules in easy, fun way (50+ modules for Grades 4 to 10)

- Future Ready Bulletins (56 bulletins & more every 2 weeks for Grades 4 to 10)

- NEP Values modules (50+ modules mapped grade-wise for Grades Nursery to 5)

- Artificial Intelligence modules (Grade 5 and above)

Easy teacher guidance is available with each module and modules are designed to seamlessly blend into your school curriculum.

Please pay using the button below: {{SIGNATURE_LINK}}.

or

Click on the link below: {{SIGNATURE_LINK}}.

Contact your school admin or write to Support@valuezschool.com for any further assistance.

Your partner in the 21st century learner journey.

Valuez School

Test School billings
student_body:
Dear  {{COMPANY_NAME}}
Greetings from {{COMPANY_NAME}}
This email is to confirm your service request for {{VISIT_TITLE}} on {{APPOINTMENT_DATE}} {{APPOINTMENT_TIME}} has been generated for the following address  {{CUSTOMER_PROPERTY}}.


If you have any questions and want to reschedule for any reason, then respond to this email. We appreciate and value your business {{CUSTOMER_COMPANY}},
Thank you for choosing us!
Have a great day!
Regards
{{COMPANY_NAME}}

subject: support {{SCHOOL_NAME}}
description: Email templates when a school is sent to a customer
admin_body:
Dear {{COMPANY_NAME}},

Thank you for the meeting. With the information you provided we've been able to create a detailed brief of your job and how best we can help you achieve your goals.

The plan is attached for your consideration, along with a quote for the final fee.

I'm aware the quoted amount (S${{QUOTATION_TOTAL}}) is above our original estimate. At the time of the estimate, we didn't have all the details for your project. This quote is of full project fee and the final price – you won't get a nasty surprise when the bill comes!

Here is the link for approval, Please click here.

We appreciate your feedback on the brief, and if there are any amendments to be made, please let us know. We look forward to working with you!

Yours Sincerely

{{COMPANY_NAME}}
